nodes.excerpt: I finally found an answer to a problem that had plagued me for months! How to script, or automate, tasks in vRealize; for example, destroying a deployed blueprint. The answer was simpler than I initially thought… It turns out that the Catalog Service REST API provides all that functionality that is required to automate specific tasks such as request a Blueprint to be deployed (built), get the IP address of a VM, or destroy a deployed blueprint.
